import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import ICONS from '../../../constant/icons' import Slider from 'react-slick' const Testimoni = ({ datas }) => { const settings = { speed: 500, dots: false, autoplay: true, lazyLoad: true, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 2.5, slidesToScroll: 1, nextArrow: , prevArrow: , } return (

Testimonial

{datas.map((data) => (

{data.by}

{data.testimony}

))}
) } Testimoni.propTypes = { datas: PropTypes.array, } export default Testimoni
